column5: hey GCD.. im comming so ya better bring the deet cause im bringing the wife for back up...  lol is there going to be a pot luck????  sure wish ccmt & bly were going
So, do we have a head count yet?  Joey
Well just wondering if its too late to inquire glen??...i dont have anywhere to stay,but i wouldnt mind catching some nipissing walleyes though!!!!!....when is the exact date????

EVERYONE GOING TO THE G2G....... I was just in touch with Kevin at lakeair and he said they were out of fire wood at this time.. so we need a group effort for fire wood. if you could bring some up with you then we could have the g2g fire . im sure everyone would like a little warm place to shoot the breeze around. thanks in advance.   Dann

I always bring firewood to Lakair but use it for the early mornings.  No better way to start the day than a 4 A.M. bonfire with a pot of coffee brewing on the Coleman and listening to the birds & critters waking up.  See youz all up there next week.
Yeah, I'll bring a little too. Kevin, are you running out of trees?  Some of the picnic tables are due for replacement anyhow. And I'll bet that the deck on cabin #11 would last a long weekend.
i'll see if i can snag a couple skids outta the alley at work too..
That's great Glen.  Now make sure Avery and Pepsi are nowhere near it  Joey
Hey Glen ill bring the $$ Did you remember my package LOL??
Right on!  We're both hard, weathered Canucks...  Nobody does it better!  Shall I bring my ear plugs?!  HD

Well i got er all booked up!!! see Y'all up there .. Hey Glen i was wondering about that great rod holder you have how much would you charge me to bring one down if its not too much trouble The one you had at BOQ for one peice rods ??
+ Glen ask TJ to pin this September  GTG so we can get a roll call !!
Hahahaha, not sure about ear plugs, but a fire extuingisher might be a good idea  Joey
Hang on.. Would you be the sexy lady?!
Well I hope Roy's referring to me, but you never know, Glen and him are like this  ya know!!
When you heading up Joey?!  Do you wanna go twozies?  Gass is on me!  WOOOHOOOH
We're actually going for the whole week, so probably arrive Sunday the 14th, leaving Sunday the 21st.  You?  Joey

Nah, gonna be in NY for that weekend, I gotta butter the missus up a little so she'll let do me my thing.. Dems are da breaks.  I'll be heading up the 17th or the 18th, depending on when we decide to come back from the trip.  I'll see you there then!  Fidel
Is it Leslie or Lester G?  Joey
We can't pin the thread until 30 days before the event.
I am pretty sure we made Roy an honorary Cajun Last year. He does have the right blood line he just decided not to migrate south with the rest of his clan.  Art
Save a nip for me .. .hope to pop in Friday afternoon on the 19th to say 'howdy all'

Just thought I would throw this out there for all:  I havent posted too much but am on ever day. I am off from the 17th to the 23rd so I think I would like to drop in if all are welcome and put some faces to the posts.... I am in Sturgeon falls so I could probably just drive down everyday or boat in, however not to familiar with the west arm~~or what condition I would be in after all those pops and cough syrup  : ) So maybe stay a night or two....lol  Also if anyone is planning on going down early and wants to get out on other parts of Nipissing or into back lakes, just PM me and we can meet in Sturg and I can take peeps out pike/walleye not a musky guy but Im a quick learner    .... I have a 1900 Lund PROV so can fit up to 5 peeps FYI.  Let me know,  Benny
Fantastic idea Benny, we'd love to meet you.  Bring beer
Dang, unless I can get someone to trade days off with me I can't even do a day trip   My days off will be Mon/Tues from Aug 31 to Oct 11  Have fun  Maureen
Well, I'm in... thanks Gerritt! HH
Anytime Joe  G
Hey Dawg! That coonass from Louisiana still comin? And what kinda cuffs didja axe me to get?
Whereaboots is this connass from?
I am confirmed from the 18th to the 21st.....
i'm pretty interested in coming to this, i'd have to be a first mate on someones boat though
Erik... No worries about finding a boat spot.. noone will be left on shore, unless it is of you're own choosing  G
Is there a campsite map online? Do you guys mind posting your site numbers so others and I can decide which ones to book.  Thanks guys,  Curt
No worries Curt, just call Lakair and tell Kevin or Leslie how many people. Every one generally camps in one spot anyway.
Curt, you pretty much just show up with you're tent and setup where there is an open spot.. there are not really assigned spots during the G2G  G
cool thanks
Curt if you are going though, it is wise to call Lakair to let Kevin and Leslie know you will be coming.  G..
hey greencoachdog:  i will go but you have to promise that there wont be any skeeter killings that weekend!!!!

Hey Glen this really sounds great !!! Count me in as well Wha do you think the chances of Kevin and Leslie letting me cash in that Free Cottage Voucher I won at the June GTG!!! I hope cause that would be Great !!!

This GTG sounds great  & it just so happens my buddy & I were plannin a campin/fishin trip for sometime in September...I'll pass the information on, but I think it's safe to say you can count at least 2 more in on this!

Glen, Roy..  I talked it over with the lass and she's agreed to let me go!  YIPPY-YI-YO-KI-YAY!!  I'd love to make it for the 17th, but realistically I'm aiming for the 18th...  If there's still a spot left in the cabin, I'll take it!  As far as moneys are concerned, we can work out the details now or later.  OOH BOY..  Can ya'll say HOOTENANNY?!  HD

Three Cajuns, a Coonass, a Redneck and sexy lady and then there's Paul. It should be a good time Fidel. As far as the 'monies' go, there are no details. We work it out real fast over a beer.  Good on ya fer making the trip.
Aye Right On!  This being said, who's on that line-up monsieur mod?  Who's the coonass?  You or Glen?!  GIGGITY.  HD
Got of love being in a class of your own.
HAHAH.  It'll be a melting pot of different folk, from all ends of the continent!
Well Glen called me a Crazy Canuck yesterday, so I'm not sure which category I'm in now  Looking forward to bunking with you Highdrifter  Joey
I would be interested in this count me in  Rob
LOL  In that case, I'm bringing the keg..  and the jambalaya!!  Roy, Glen, I'm going if ya'll are going!  OOHH BOY I'm tingly all over..  HD
That just sounds wrong.  JF
Would a walleye tourney be tough with the slot that's in place there?  Or would it be snap a pic with a ruler to get credit?  Actually, why am I chiming in...I cant even go....LOL.
Don't, you're sounding like Doug.
Cliff, I think we're lining something up for a 9PM to 9AM tourney. There'll be some good fish in there.
No doubt Roy!!  Just that all those nice sized ones in the slot cant be taken in for the measure in.  Man...I wish I could swing that weekend!!!!
ensuing guffaws.  I'd better bring the lass then..
That'll help.  JF
So is it 19,20,21 for sure?
O.K. Gerrit. Count me in with you. I have that friday off so I may head up Thursday night.
Would this by any chance be a long weekend, or near one?  I don't have a calander here to tell me.  I might be convinced to go.
Not a long weekend...
Booked for Sept 17th - 21st..
pardon my ignorance, what's a G2G?
nm figured it out

I will be staying at Memquisit (just around the corner) from the 17th to 21st for our Annual FishGuts Fall Classic.  I will be sure to stop by.  Gotta meet the Dawg and a few others I haven't met yet as well.
Sounds great Roger, will you have the usual crew with you?
11 great buddies including my two sons and my brother. Good friends, good fishing and a little music along the way......

I'm staying just down the road and will be heading back to PA that Saturday.    I may just pack up a little earlier on Friday and make a run around around to say HI Friday afternoon and evening.    Still trying to work this out, but this sounds like a good opportunity to meet some new OFC'rs.
I am booking tonight. Arrive Sept 18th leave either the 21st or the 22nd.

OOH OOH MEMEME!!  We'll said sir G..  I told the missus we'd blow our airmiles on a trip to Vancouver the week of the 15th, but I would luuuuuvv to hit it up with ya'll that weekend!  Qu'est que t'en dit mon grand Roy?  On se graye ti d'une cabine?!  yyyeeeeehaawww HD
I may just pop up around in the evenings to say HI and enjoy some of those southern-built campfires.   A little 'grain' makes one whale of a campfire.  We'll see how she goes.
I would be interested in this option too.  Do we tent it or rent a cabin?  Maybe split this three ways with a couple of guys?  Splashhopper
I am gonna try to make this one. is the date set yet?  Don
Thanks Glen - looking forward to it  Don
September that is...

Still pretty good fishing up here in September, and it doesn't really cool down until it gets dark.  I think I might have to bust out the tent and come over for a day.  I havn't fished the west arm very much so you guys might have to give me a few pointers.  Mike
My Mrs and I were just talking about an early fall camping trip to Lakeair.  This would work for us.  just JOHN
anyone from the Niagara area plan on trying to make this trip if it happens???

I have to see what this lakeair is all about  1 year and this seems to be a  good time.Will be going if someone can tell me about the area and camping possibilities,and if a small boat is OK for the area.Lake Nippissing is  a huge lake . Plus been married way to long she's gotten to know me and is never a question when I go fishing.Not like some of you that have to clean up around the house.LOL No just kidding she's a great wife.
~~~What the heck at chance to take some shots at DAWG at point blank range why not, count me in, and I'm sure Slug will want to come
Dependin on exact dates and cost,,,I'm a go.  Neil ps: mayby I'll drag Bernie out there too
Sounds interesting. I'm always willing to try new waters. It's a little bit out of the way for a weekend though.  I guess I'll have to work on catching a Thursday afternoon cold.

No big deal for a small boat. Lots of channels and protected bays, with some bigger water near by. I'd be more worried about leaving a trail of bread crumbs to find my way home. Lots of great spots for my canoe.  Hope this link works, it should be a map of the area to give you an idea.  http://atlas.nrcan.gc.ca/site/english/maps...nodata_ntdb_50k
I might like to go but i need more thought on it though.  Rob we could take my boat up.
I'm gonna try my best to make this one!!!....Have to see if i can get a buddy interested in this neck of the woods to split the costs, so it's not as hard on the wallet!!!
Glen! A coonass Cajun ringer from Baton Rouge Louisiana? Sounds like my kinda folks. What's the attendee count up to so far? If everyone brings one beer up with them at least I'LL have a prize table.
Roy, Prize table ??? Walleye tourney Perhaps ????
put me and my buddy down as very near yes
September sounds great for a day or so.  I'll already be in the area from September 6 thru 20.  May be able to cut a day or so out and drop by.  Sounds great ... keep us posted.
Third week of September Sounds good to me Glen.  I missed ya this June Bubba but love to hook up with ya if you teach me the Sabiki thingy.  MTP
while I cant make the trip you are welcome to stop over for a visit/sleeping place Glen and guest if he comes up with you.  Art
Sounds like a plan to me. Coonass's and Redneck's are always welcome....Maybe Tom might come down for some fun......
Dang Glen. now you went and dun it!............

I'll try to make it this time around as well! I agree with Brian (misfish) though, maybe we can go somewhere else? Depending on where everyone's located, we can find somewhere that's closer, especially for ya GCD.
YUp... sounds perfect to me... keep us up to date please! HH

Working all summer makes it for the most part impossible for me to go in June anymore.  Sept sounds great, but keep in mind the further you get into the month the earlier it gets dark and the colder it gets.  ( been there done that )  I'm scheduled for an angiogram July 17th and if no surgery is required I will try my best to be there.
Interesting Glen..  I just booked the week of the 15th off!  I wonder how the fishing is though?!  I'm told it's prime time for lunges, but what about eyes?  Still, I'd be down for that!!  HD
Hell, yeah! I gotta fish with Fidel at least ONCE in my life!
Oh stop it you...
As long as the bank account will allow, I am interested!
As much as we'd love to, September is a tough month for us babysitting wise!!  We'll keep it in mind just in case though...

Cant make for the 2nd week. We will be off somewhere celebrating our 50th anniversary,and may be a bit short of Moolah. But then.... Ive got my 'MAD MONEY' to fall back on  Just have to see how things work out.  Great idea Glen !!!
I'm interested too but I don't think it will happen for me this year, unless I'm looking for a divorce  Not a good fishing year for me   .

Well, the Friday is exam day for my students so likely the best I could expect would be to hit the road at about midnight to get there for the dawn run Saturday. Dunno if it's worth my while or not if everyone's heading out early Sunday. Mebbe I should just mark next June in the calendar and plan accordingly.  JF

Jeez. I'd sure hate to miss seeing you puking. I'm gonna talk to my fishing buddy, see if he's up for it. We'll do the tent thing and rent a boat and mebbe stick around for a few extra days if he's interested.  JF
Count me in! I was disappointed I could not make the June G2G..  September sounds PERFECT!  G
I'm interested!
I (we) would be there in a heartbeat Glen. What do you have in mind...
Perfect time if you ask me Glen. Great fishing, and hunting season isn't quite open yet  Sinker
Why not try something dif? Like maybe, something down yer way Glenn.
I'm back up at Lakair from August 14th - 20th Glen, but another trip in September sounds like an excellent idea.  I was there in September '06 and we practically had the lake to ourselves....perfect
Ive never been to a OFC g2g.  If there is another this year I would go.   If it falls on a weekend that I work I guess Ill be callin in.  Fishing emergency. HeHe.
As a matter of fact I did Glen, and I figure she's about 5 pounds heavier now.  I've still got her address, so maybe I'll go see if she wants to come out and play again if  we go up this September

I'd be interested, depending on which week it happens. I'm booked to teach a course for a two week period in there somewhere but if I can work around that I'm in.  One other thing, I've got no ride - boat ride that is.  JF
13th 14th 15th or somewhere around there would work great. I'm sure that Kevin and Leslie would have some cottages and I doubt that anyone would be in the campsites.

I'm in ... I couldn't make it 2 weeks ago I was in a Tourney.... no Tourney in September... and easier to get an extra day off.  Walleye , Pike & Muskie not to mention the Smallies are all on the feed bag at that time.  :Gonefishing:  Randy

....Every month you say Glen, wonder who thunk that up?  I'm sure I could swing it with work no matter the weekend and either way it'd be my B'day present to me.  Crikey I may do August as well, nice to have senior picks for holidays!

I go out for a quick paddle on Canada Day   and this happens???  It's only been 5 hours and I feel like I almost missed out.  September in Canada, I make sure my auger is sharp.  I think Dawg really does like us.
I'm in if someone got room in their boat. If I don't have one by then.
Nancur373 & JohnH, I would be more then happy to take both of you out in my boat infact it would be my pleasure. Please consider it a done deal.  G.
Sounds good G
Could be possible.  We usually go twice a year, and Sept. is generally our second trip.  Let us know what Kevin says G.  Joey
19th, 20th, 21st would also work fine Glen....
I can't do an overnight...no holidays now until Dec. and no money .  I may make it up for a day trip depending on what days off I end up with.  Maureen
